meanings.definition: To make something more appealing to yuppies.
meanings.sent1: The trendy cafe yuppified its menu to attract young professionals.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent yuppified the loft to appeal to upscale buyers.
meanings.sent3: The old bookstore yuppified its decor with sleek shelves and modern lighting.
meanings.sent4: The small town was yuppified by the arrival of a fancy art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The city park was yuppified with new benches and trendy food trucks.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities associated with yuppies.
meanings.sent1: The upscale neighborhood had a yuppified vibe with its trendy cafes and boutique shops.
meanings.sent2: She dressed in a yuppified style, wearing designer labels and carrying a fancy handbag.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted yuppified, refusing to eat anything but gourmet cat food.
meanings.sent4: The car dealership had a yuppified showroom, showcasing luxury vehicles and high-end features.
meanings.sent5: The office space had a yuppified look, with modern furniture and sleek design elements.
